title: Boards Profile 404 and "You must be level 15 or higher to create a discussion"
body: As said in title, when I click the 'boards profile' button, it gives me a 404 not found page. Also, even though I am already level 15, it does not allow me to post on the boards. Furthermore, as I am writing this, it says "Posting as IS1b9800080116ec4a16983" and not my username. Is there a solution to this?

replies.body: Your account may need to sync to the boards when posting on the boards, and it looks like your thread here did just that.  Refresh your browser to make sure that your browser is showing your current level and not a cache.  Let me know if you have any questions!

Immediately after I posted this, the boards profile link started to work. Although it still thinks that I am under level 15 though... It won't even let me post on boards where the minimum level is lvl 5.
